statements: SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers WHERE quantity > 1000
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers WHERE inventory_item = 'Uranium'
SELECT id, quantity, supplier_name FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Energy%'
SELECT inventory_item, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers GROUP BY inventory_item
SELECT supplier_name, inventory_item, quantity FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY id
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(inventory_item) AS total_items FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_items > 3
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers WHERE quantity <= 50 ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM nuclear_energy_suppliers GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT id, material_type, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, material_type, quantity, price FROM Transactions ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
SELECT material_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Transactions GROUP BY material_type;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE price >= 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT material_type, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY material_type ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM uranium_fuel;
SELECT id, supplier_name, quantity FROM uranium_fuel ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, production_date FROM uranium_fuel WHERE id < 100 AND supplier_name LIKE 'Supplier%';
SELECT id, supplier_name, enrichment_level FROM enriched_uranium WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, quantity, storage_location FROM radioactive_materials WHERE material_type = 'Uranium';
SELECT * FROM uranium_fuel ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM uranium_fuel WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM enriched_uranium WHERE enrichment_level >= 4.0 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, material_type FROM radioactive_materials WHERE quantity > 500 AND storage_location = 'Secure Vault';
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity, AVG(quantity) AS average_quantity FROM radioactive_materials;
SELECT * FROM uranium_fuel;
SELECT id, supplier_name, quantity FROM enriched_uranium ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity FROM radioactive_materials WHERE radiation_level > 0.5;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM uranium_fuel WHERE expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, quantity_change, timestamp FROM inventory_logs WHERE quantity_change < 0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM uranium_fuel WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM enriched_uranium WHERE enrichment_level >= 3.5;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity FROM radioactive_materials WHERE radiation_level < 2.0 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, quantity_change, timestamp FROM inventory_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity, enrichment_level FROM enriched_uranium WHERE quantity > 50 AND enrichment_level > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM uranium_fuels;
SELECT supplier_name, quantity FROM enriched_uranium WHERE enrichment_level > 3.5;
SELECT supplier_name, material_type, radiation_level FROM radioactive_materials ORDER BY radiation_level DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM inventory_log WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM uranium_fuels WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM enriched_uranium GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT material_type, AVG(radiation_level) AS avg_radiation_level FROM radioactive_materials GROUP BY material_type ORDER BY avg_radiation_level DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(contact_person) > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory_log WHERE quantity_change < 0 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
